## Game.getNextPlayer() method

Returns the player following the given one in clockwise turn order.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getNextPlayer(player: TPlayer): TPlayer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  player | TPlayer | Previous player in clockwise turn order. |

**Returns:**

TPlayer

Next player in clockwise turn order.
